Animating a 100-foot-tall statue is worth the cost for spellcasters guarding immense dungeons. **[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Animated Colossus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1066) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 19 **Perception** +23; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33 **Str** +9 **Dex** +2 **Con** +8 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 --- **AC** 39 (35 when broken); construct armor **Fort** +31 **Ref** +21 **Will** +19 **HP** 245 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Construct Armor** Like normal objects, an animated colossus has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the colossus takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an animated colossus is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 35 when broken.
**Enormous** An animated colossus takes up a space of 6 squares by 6 squares (30 feet by 30 feet) and is 100 feet tall. --- **Speed** 50 feet **Melee** fist +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+17 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Melee** foot +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+17 bludgeoning **Colossus's Grasp** The colossus can [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) a creature using only one hand. It can move normally with a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) in its fist, carrying the creature along. If it has two creatures grabbed in this way, it can't use its fist Strike. **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 3d12+11 bludgeoning, DC 36 **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Huge or smaller, foot, DC 36
